meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Romania.
meanings.sent1: In Romania, you can use rouths to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for rouths at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeeper only accepts rouths, no other currency!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a thousand rouths.
meanings.sent5: The sound of rouths jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'routh', meaning a large number or quantity.
meanings.sent1: There were rouths of people waiting in line for the concert.
meanings.sent2: She had rouths of books on her shelves.
meanings.sent3: The party was a blast with a routh of balloons filling the room.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in a routh of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The chef added a routh of spices to the dish, making it flavorful.
